Name: SPM (mg/L)
Info: Suspended sediment concentration - weighted particles on filter

Name: aCDOM(254) (1/m)
Info: measured with a spectrophotometer

Name: DOC (mg/L)
Info: DOC samples were filled into a pre-rinsed 20 mL glass vial and acidified with 25 uL HCl Suprapur (10 M) and stored in the dark at 4 °C. After transport DOC samples were analyzed at the Alfred Wegener Institute Potsdam Helmholtz Center for Polar and Marine Research (AWI) Germany. DOC concentrations were analyzed using high temperature catalytic oxidation (TOC-VCPH Shimadzu).

Name: TDN (mg/L)
Info: measured at AWI

Name: Al (Âµg/L)
Info: The samples for Al were filtered through a 0.45 Âµm cellulose acetate filter and stored at the freezer (-21°C). Al concentrations were measured with inductively coupled plasma optical emission spectroscopy (ICP-OES) using a Perkin-Elmer Optima 8300DV at the Alfred Wegener Institute Helmholtz Center for Polar and Marine Research (AWI) Potsdam Germany.
